params.description: Create a custom filesystem

params.title: Custom Module Manager
params.description: A custom module to manage webtrees custom modules.

params.title: Extended Import/Export
params.description: A custom module for advanced GEDCOM import, export, and filter operations. The module also supports remote downloads/uploads/filters via URL requests.

params.title: My Custom Tags
params.description: A module to provide custom tags, types, relationship descriptors, and roles in events

params.title: OAuth2 Client
params.description: A custom module to implement a OAuth2 client for webtrees.

params.title: Repository Hierarchy
params.description: A hierarchical structured list of the sources of an archive based on the call numbers of the sources

params.title: Fancy Imagebar
params.description: An imagebar with small images between header and content.

params.title: Fancy Research Links
params.description: A sidebar tool to provide quick links to popular research web sites.

params.title: Fancy Treeview
params.description: A narrative overview of the descendants or ancestors of one family (branch).

params.title: JustLight
params.description: Theme — JustLight

params.title: Simple footer module
params.description: Add an extra footer and page.

params.title: Media Display (as in webtrees 2.0)
params.description: Display media objects as in webtrees 2.0, showing multiple media items and additional notes belonging to the same object on the individual page.

params.title: Simple menu module
params.description: Add an extra mainmenu item and page.

params.title: Lantmäteriet
params.description: Create maps using www.lantmateriet.se.

params.title: Primer
params.description: Theme — Primer

params.title: GVExport
params.description: Generate a diagram of everyone in your family tree. Highly customisable, with the ability to navigate in your browser or export the diagram to a file.

params.title: Descendants chart
params.description: An overview of an individual’s descendants.

params.title: Fan chart
params.description: A fan chart of an individual’s ancestors.

params.title: Pedigree chart
params.description: A pedigree chart of an individual’s ancestors.

params.title: Statistics
params.description: Various statistics charts.

params.title: Rural
params.description: Theme — Rural

params.title: ℍ Clippings cart enhanced
params.description: Add records from your family tree to the clippings cart and execute an action on them.

params.title: ℍ&ℍwt Interactive tree XT
params.description: An interactive tree, showing all the ancestors and descendants of an individual.

params.title: ℍ TAMchart
params.description: Download Gedcom information to client-side for postprocessing in TAM.

params.title: ℍ LINchart
params.description: Download Gedcom information to client-side for postprocessing in LINEAGE.

params.title: ℍ Tagging service manager
params.description: View and manage Tags for better structuring your Family Tree

params.title: ℍ MultTreeView
params.description: A treeview-diagram, showing the ancestors and descendants of an individual.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Classic Look & Feel
params.description: A module adjusting all themes and other features, providing a look & feel closer to the webtrees 1.x version.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Clippings Cart
params.description: Select records from your family tree and save them as a GEDCOM file. Replacement for the original 'Clippings Cart' module.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Common
params.description: A module providing common classes and translations for other 'Vesta' custom modules. Make sure to enable this module if any other Vesta module is enabled.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Extended Relationships
params.description: A module providing various algorithms used to determine relationships. Includes a chart displaying relationships between two individuals, as a replacement for the original 'Relationships' module. Also includes an extended 'Who is online' block.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Facts and events
params.description: A tab showing the facts and events of an individual. Replacement for the original 'Facts and events' module.  Also extends facts and events on the family page. Also provides additional map links.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Families
params.description: A tab showing the close relatives of an individual. Replacement for the original 'Families' module.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Gov4Webtrees
params.description: A module integrating GOV (historic gazetteer) data.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Places and Pedigree map
params.description: The Place hierarchy. Also show the location of events and the birthplace of ancestors on a map. Replacement for the original 'Place hierarchy', 'Places' and  'Pedigree map' modules.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Research Suggestions
params.description: A module providing suggestions for additional research, based on available sources.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Shared Places
params.description: A module providing support for shared places.

params.title: ⚶ Vesta Webtrees Location Data Provider
params.description: A module providing (non-GEDCOM-based) webtrees location data to other modules.

params.title: Sosa-Stradonitz (Ahnentafel)
params.description: A sidebar showing Sosa-Stradonitz number of individuals.

params.title: Faits historiques de France et d’ailleurs 🇪🇺
params.description: Variante de FrenchHistory.php pour webtrees 2.2

params.title: Extended family
params.description: A tab showing the extended family of an individual.

params.title: Legal Notice and Privacy Policy
params.description: Legal notice as a footer element for this site.

params.title: German Chancellors Presidents
params.description: Historical facts - Chancellors and Presidents of Germany (since 1949)

params.title: Wars and Battles Worldwide 🇩🇪
params.description: Historical facts (in German) - Wars and Battles Worldwide (since 900)

params.title: Gramps Historical Facts
params.description: Historical facts (in several languages) - provided by Gramps

params.title: Family Tree Home Page
params.description: This module changes the front page for signed-in users. After a sign in from the front page, users will go back to the Family Tree instead of redirecting to My Page.

params.title: Argon Light
params.description: A light theme for Webtrees based on Argon Design System

params.title: Mail System
params.description: Sends out newsletters at regular intervals

params.title: Branch statistics
params.description: Statistics of an individual’s ancestors.

params.title: Interactive tree (Topola)
params.description: Opens the Topola Genealogy Viewer interactive familty tree.

params.title: XREF and UID values module.
params.description: A sidebar to show XREF and UID values.

params.title: Enhanced family book
params.description: A chart of an individual’s ancestors and descendants, as a family book (enhanced with marriages, images, and more).

params.title: Research tasks report
params.description: A research tasks Report with filters and other options.

params.title: HTML Advanced
params.description: An advanced HTML Block

params.title: Watermark Module
params.description: Changes the size and position of the watermark

params.title: Faces
params.description: This module provide easy way to mark people on group photo.

params.title: Recent photos
params.description: A list of photos that have been uploaded recently.

params.title: Reminder
params.description: Daily e-mail & Slack digest with list of the anniversaries.

params.title: Tree View Full Screen
params.description: This module allow switch tree view to full screen mode.

params.title: Material Design Icons
params.description: This module replace icons with Material Design Icons.

params.title: Main menu manual
params.description: Add an extra item to the main menu as a link to a webtrees manual.

params.title: Telegram
params.description: Sends Telegram notifications about family events, such as birthdays and anniversaries.

params.title: News
params.description: Add an extra item to the main menu as a link to a webtrees news.

params.description: Historical facts (in Finnish) - pääministerit, presidentit, suuriruhtinaat ja kuninkaat

params.title: Family navigator - show parent families last

params.description: Cross-references to Gedcom datasets, Markdown editor, context-sensitive link to the GenWiki webtrees manual

params.description: Historia Polski

params.description: Seamless integration with WordPress Kadence Child Theme.
